messages.content:
Hi PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2, may I know if we can have online version of Fundamentals of Corporate Finance by Stephen A. PERSON_LASTNAME_3, PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_4, and
Bradford D. PERSON_LASTNAME_1, McGraw-Hill?

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: I just checked, but seems no book left now? can you advice? since this is our Text Book, thanks

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: no problem

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: ok thank you. and for the online version, how long can we use it per time? I think we cannot download it right?

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: oh this hel

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: helps

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: thank you

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: all good. thank you

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: Hello, how may I help you?

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: sure, please give me a moment to check...

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: It seems like the online copies for both the 2022 and 2016 edition is currently in use. In this case, I think if you wait a while, usually the book will become available after the current person finished using it

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: if you need just a specific chapter or pages, there is a physical copy in the library as well in the reserve area as well as a photocopy machine

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: The time limit is about 2 hours or so :)

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: and yes, you won't be able to download the pdf version for this particular title

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: you're welcome! we have a research guide on e-textbooks as well! there are some tips about printing and such:https://researchguides.smu.edu.sg/c.php?g=942551&p=6824809

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: you're most welcome :)

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: Is there anything else I can assist?

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: alright, if there's nothing else, then I will end the chat shortly. But please feel free to start a new one if you have other questions for us.

messages.speaker: Help Desk
messages.content: Have a good week ahead and good luck with your studies! :)

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: perfect! thank you, have a nice day
